A not so long time ago, in a workstation far, far away...
Developer Wars

Episode 1

THE ANGULAR MENACE


It is a period of discovery. Rebel React developers, learning from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the evil Angular JS EMPIRE.

During the investigation, React developers managed to steal secret plans to the Angular JS EMPIRE's ultimate weapon, the ANGULAR STAR, a bulky overbloated technology to destroy a galaxy of project sprints.

Pursued by the Angular JS EMPIRE's sinister agents, React developers race home, custodian of the plans that can save their project and restore freedom to the development galaxy...

By the way I did this particluar animation using only CSS (well compiled from SASS) and HTML. In fact this entire site only has 10 lines of Javascript and really only toggles the menu animation classes, literally. This is just pure HTML and CSS design. Pretty cool huh...
